attributes.action: Stop social services removing children and twisting reports
attributes.background: Picking on families that can cope with children and taking it to court and twisting reports so the can get taken away and then when they speak to you about basically turn around and say that kids are been taken with massive smiles on there face

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
